author: rin9s
title: Decentralized Governance Alliance
description:
Decentralized Gov. is in its infancy and presents a fundamental issue for DAOs.
We can offer dGov resources & expertise to attract DAOs.
solution: Establish the foundations for a  dGov research and standardization body. Grow our reputation by providing a service for the entire space.
experience: Over 3 years in the Cardano community and dGov space. Academic background, Tech consultant and Program Manager.
